summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeLOOPS Milky Cleanser dissolves dirt, makeup, and impurities while purifying your pores and strengthening your skin's lipid barrier. Each pre-soaked biodegradable Bamboo pad lift aways longwearing makeup and daily grime without tugging or pulling. Use daily in the morning and/or evening.
details: DetailsBenefitsDeep CleansingHydratingGentle Exfoliating / PolishingDermatologist TestedKey IngredientsMilky Oil Complex (Cloudberry Seed, Macadamia Nut, and Jojoba Seed Oils)a trifecta of omega-rich oils that restores lackluster skin with essential lipids and vitamins:Lactic Acid: an alpha-hydroxy acid that dissolves the stubborn bonds between dead skin cells while acting like a moisture magnet to help your skin look instantly smoother and plumper with fewer fine linesLavender Flower Extract: a soothing botanical that purifies the skin while regulating sebum production for a clarified, balanced-feeling complexionCeramide NP: a skin-identical fatty acid that supports healthy barrier function to reduce trans-epidermal water loss and minimize the look of dehydration lines.Formulated WithoutParabensSulfatesPhthalatesSynthetic FragrancesDrying AlcoholMineral OilItem 2624832How To UseAM/PM Gently swipe one pre-soaked Bamboo pad across damp face and neck to cleanse the skin. Rinse and pat dry. 1. Rinse face with water 2. Cleanse face & neck with cleansing pad 3. Rinse and pat dry 4. Repeat or follow with tonerIngredientsWater (Aqua/Eau), Butylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Polyglyceryl-4 Caprate, Glycerin, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Tromethamine, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Cucurbita Pepo (Pumpkin) Fruit Extract, Rubus Fruticosus (Blackberry) Fruit Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Gluconolactone, Disodium EDTA, Betaine, Panthenol, Polyglyceryl-10 Stearate, Lactic Acid, Melissa Officinalis Leaf Extract, Mentha Rotundifolia Leaf Extract, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Extract, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit Extract, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Salicylic Acid, Rubus Chamaemorus Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Inula Britannica Flower Extract, Vaccinium Angustifolium (Blueberry) Fruit Extract, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Houttuynia Cordata Extract, Nelumbium Speciosum Flower Extract, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Fruit Extract, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Ceramide NP, Thymus Vulgaris (Thyme) Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Phytosphingosine, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Origanum Vulgare Extract, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hyaluronate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Lithospermum Erythrorhizon Root Extract, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Potassium HyaluronateShipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: AM/PM Gently swipe one pre-soaked Bamboo pad across damp face and neck to cleanse the skin. Rinse and pat dry. 1. Rinse face with water 2. Cleanse face & neck with cleansing pad 3. Rinse and pat dry 4. Repeat or follow with toner

reviews.headline: Amazing cleanser
reviews.comments: This is by far the quickest facial cleanser that I've ever used. It removed all of my makeup. Such a time saver. My face felt very clean after using. Even used to cotton pad with micellar water afterwards to check and face cotton pad was clean with no residual makeup!
